text: Vanavarkal avarkalitam (neril) varuvataiyo allatu unkal iraivane (avarkalitam) varuvataiyo allatu unkal iraivanin periyator attatci varuvataiyo tavira, (veretanaiyum) avarkal etir parkkinranara? Unkal iraivanin periyator attatci(yakiya iruti nal) varuvatarku munnar nampikkai kollatiruntu allatu nampikkai kontiruntum oru narceyalum ceyyatiruntuvittu annalil avarkal kollum nampikkai oru palanaiyum alikkatu.
